ParticipantName, now that you have selected the items, it's time to pay for them. Here is the receipt with the total amount, and this is the wallet with money. Take your time to count out the exact amount needed for the groceries. If you need any help, I'm right here. Would you like the instructions repeated or any assistance with this task?

(ready_to_continue=yes)

Patient: Can you remind me what the total on the receipt is? I'm trying to figure out how much to give you.

(forgetfulness_status=yes, frustration_status=low, anger_status=no, engagement_status=moderate, verbal_utterance="Can you remind me what the total on the receipt is? I'm trying to figure out how much to give you.", nonverbal_behavior=looking at the receipt and wallet with determination)

(ready_to_continue=true)

Certainly, ParticipantName. The total amount for your groceries is $45.50. You can use the bills and coins in the wallet to count out the money. Take your time and don't rush; it's important to do it at your own pace. If you are unsure or need help at any point, just let me know, and I can assist you.

(forgetfulness_status=yes, frustration_status=yes, anger_status=no, engagement_status=yes, verbal_utterance="Is this the right amount?" while holding out some money, nonverbal_behavior=fingers slowly counting the bills, looking for reassurance)

(ready_to_continue=true)

That's a good start, ParticipantName. You're doing well. Let's check the amount together, shall we? How many dollars do you have there?

(forgetfulness_status=yes, frustration_status=no, anger_status=no, engagement_status=yes, verbal_utterance="I think I have...?", nonverbal_behavior=holding money out towards interventionist, expression of uncertainty)

(ready_to_continue=false)

Of course, let's count it together. Here, this is a twenty-dollar bill, and these are ones. Can you try to put together the exact amount the receipt says, which is $18.75?

(forgetfulness_status=yes, frustration_status=low, anger_status=no, engagement_status=high, verbal_utterance="So, I give you this twenty... and, um, where are the coins?", nonverbal_behavior=participant begins to hand over a twenty-dollar bill but pauses, looking for coins)

(ready_to_continue=true)

Patient: You're on the right track with the twenty-dollar bill. Now, how about we find the coins together to make up the rest of the amount? Look in the wallet and see if you can find some quarters to add to the twenty.
